Class Hangman

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hangman
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HangmanManager

    public class Hangman
extends Object
implements HangmanManager
    Basic (fair) implementation of HangmanManager.
    Version:
    12/2/2016
    Author:
    Bennett Alex Myers

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hangman

        public Hangman(List<String> dictionary,
               int length,
               int max)
        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Initialize a new hangman game using a given dictionary, word length, and number of wrong guesses allowed.
        Parameters:
        dictionary - a list of words from which to choose for a hangman game
        length - the length of the word to be used for the game
        max - the maximum number of wrong guesses allowed
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if length is less than 1 or if max is less than 0

    • Method Detail

      • chooseGoalWord

        private static String chooseGoalWord(List<String> dictionary,
                                     int length)
        Utility method that randomly chooses a word of a given length, given a list of words.
        Parameters:
        dictionary - a list of words from which to randomly choose a word
        length - the length of the desired word
        Returns:
        a randomly chosen word of the given length from the given dictionary

        public SortedSet<Character> guesses()
        Accesses the set of letters already guessed by the user.
        Specified by:
        guesses in interface HangmanManager
        Returns:
        the current set of letters guessed by the user

      • pattern

        public String pattern()
               throws IllegalStateException
        Return the hangman-style display pattern of letters and dashes appropriate to the current state based on the letters already guessed and the goal.
        Specified by:
        pattern in interface HangmanManager
        Returns:
        the hangman-style pattern to be displayed to the user
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if there is no goal word

      • patternize

        private char patternize(char c)
        Returns either the given character if the character has been guessed or a dash '-' if the given character has not been guessed.
        Parameters:
        c - the character being considered
        Returns:
        the character if it has been guessed, a dash otherwise

      • record

        public int record(char guess)
           throws IllegalStateException,
                  IllegalArgumentException
        Record state changes based on new letter guess.
        Specified by:
        record in interface HangmanManager
        Parameters:
        guess - the letter being guessed [Precondition: must be lower-case letter] [Precondition: must not be among letters already guessed]
        Returns:
        the number of occurrences of the guessed letter in the goal
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no guesses left or no goal word
        IllegalArgumentException - if letter is already guessed

      • countLetterOccurrences

        private static int countLetterOccurrences(String word,
                                          char letter)
        Utility method for counting the occurrences of a letter in a word.
        Parameters:
        word - a word from which to count letter occurrences
        letter - the letter whose occurrences to count
        Returns:
        the number of times the given letter appears in the given word
